Yu-Cheng Qiu

CV Blog Presentation Publication Inspirehep TDLI

Hi there!
My name is Yu-Cheng Qiu (邱渔骋) and I am currently a postdoc researcher at the Particle Division in Tsung-Dao Lee Institute, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I work on particle physics and cosmology, with special interest in sphaleron and axion. My orcid is 0000-0002-9008-4564.
Pencil and papers are my main research weapons. However, recently I realize that numerical techniques are extremely important.

Contact Info.:
Office: N526, Tsung-Dao Lee Institute, No.1 Lisuo Road, Shanghai, 201210
E-mail: ethanqiu AT sjtu.edu.cn
